annonsrubrik: Integration Developer with fullstack interest to Platform24
annonstext:
About Doktor 24 Group

For most people, healthcare is one of the most important sectors in society. But in many ways, it has been decades behind other sectors in terms of accessibility and productivity. The Doktor24 Group is driving the change in how healthcare works. We are building "Healthcare 2.0" which means that we are, through smart, easy and, sustainable solutions, improving healthcare to ensure the best possible care at the right time in the most suitable format. We are daily working on making it more accessible, efficient with resources, and increasing the quality of care given to patients, while bridging the gap between physical and digital health-care.

Doktor 24 group is fast-growing and consists of two business areas that work tightly together: Doktor24, a digital integrated caregiver, and Platform24, an innovative health tech company that offers our award-winning platform to many healthcare providers such as several Swedish regions, insurers, and private health care providers. We are fortunate to have Investor AB (publ) and Apoteket AB as two long-term owners.

The role as an Integration Developer in the Product Success Engineering team. You will as an engineer in our PSE-team be part of a cross-functional team working on our most important projects, delivering our healthcare platform to our partners.

The team is working closely with our customers to implement development initiatives, integrations and customizations based on customer-specific needs, which also more than often ends up being part of the general product offering. You will work across the whole platform, owning everything from architecture to implementation for specific partners.

We are growing quickly, and are on a global expansion and this role will be in the frontline of driving our journey.

What are we looking for

- Communication skills - you should be comfortable collaborating and communicating with external partners and internal stakeholders to find the solutions to problems the teams are facing.
- Ability to thrive in a fast-paced role - you like to get things done having a generalist mindset digging into where it's needed.
- Experience - from Java, Spring Boot, with a good understanding of API design and relational database design.
- Development focus -  You are keen on developing your knowledge and want to broaden your skill-set with frontend technologies.

Only applicants based in Stockholm will be considered.
